fields.title: player
fields.description: Player selector. May be a player name `string`  or a [selected target](https://learn.microsoft.com/minecraft/creator/documents/commandsintroduction#target-selectors) of type player.

fields.title: itemName
fields.description: The item to clear. Clears all items if no specified. Item`ID`or block id.

fields.title: data
fields.description: The `item id` to be cleared. If not specified, all will be cleared. Default: `-1`.

fields.title: maxCount
fields.description: An `integer` that specifies how many items to clear.  Default: `-1`.

overloads.title: Clear
overloads.description: Clears, from a player's inventory, an item with a specified name or ID, in a given quantity.
